title: Solokan
author: Solokan
content: in this forum I see many people who have positions that have become legends, heroes, seniors, full members and so on. and I'm sure these people are people who have good insight, especially in the field of bitcoin and crypto. and has good discussion skills and I'm sure that person is certainly not easy to have a position like that, because of course before having a high position there must be obstacles and hurdles that must be overcome. but I want to ask everyone since when the reward system is given to members who have good quality. and what are the benefits of the reward?

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Merit system was implemented since 2018 and the benefit is mostly about signature style from each tier ranks. However if you want to attach image, you only need to become Jr. member rank or bought copper membership, or if you want to wear avatar you must reach full member rank.A newbie user who have very good knowledge about Bitcoin and post very good quality post will earn merit very easy, also some people don't care with their ranks.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Solokan on January 06, 2023, 01:51:24 PMbut I want to ask everyone since when the reward system is given to members who have good qualityI will like you to call it by what it is been known as "merit" and nit reward, and should in case you needed to get merits, you have to work on yourself and develop a value that could be admiring by members to benefit from, and just as you have been told above the year the merit system was introduced.Quote from: Solokan on January 06, 2023, 01:51:24 PMand what are the benefits of the reward?you will henceforth needed it to rank up and nothing more, while holding your smerits assigned to you from the merits received does not make any use to you.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: Solokan on January 06, 2023, 01:51:24 PMin this forum I see many people who have positions that have become legends, heroes, seniors, full members and so on. and I'm sure these people are people who have good insight, especially in the field of bitcoin and crypto. and has good discussion skills Not everyone here members used to rank up when they reach a certain number of activities and posts but not now, they need to accumulate merits for them to rank up QuoteI'm sure that person is certainly not easy to have a position like that, because of course before having a high position there must be obstacles and hurdles that must be overcome. but I want to ask everyone since when the reward system is given to members who have good quality. and what are the benefits of the reward?Not easy you have to earn those merits because it needs hard work and research on many of your posts, the reward and rank are for you to have a chance to participate in a signature campaign where members are paid for displaying banners on their signature.

comments.author: Solokan
comments.body: yes ,, now I understand about it all, and thank you to everyone who has answered my question. and the answers you post are very good, and the way they are delivered is easy to understand.

comments.author: DdmrDdmr
comments.body: Quote from: Solokan on January 06, 2023, 01:51:24 PM<…>Merits, or rewards as you call them, were introduced during late January 2018 (with a slight subsequent change in September 2018 affecting Jr. Members), with the declared goal of curbing the amount of spam on the forum. Until then, accounts ranked-up by merely posting and gaining Activity, which was easy-peasy and required no real effort, nor was it affected by the content one wrote. Merits changed that, and reduced spam a fair share I’d say, at least on the main boards, and although a certain degree of spam is inevitable, those knee deep in the habit won’t get very far up the ranking scale. Merits are essentially necessary to rank-up (which itself has some benefits on multiple fronts), though it also plays additional roles that we could associate to aspects such as gaining a certain reputation, or receiving a pat on the back every now and then. Lately, some Campaign Managers require their participants to earn a certain amount of Merits in a given period of time, so there is that too, though any reasonable and constant poster likely won’t have much trouble with this.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Solokan on January 06, 2023, 01:51:24 PMin this forum I see many people who have positions that have become legends, heroes, seniors, full members and so on. and I'm sure these people are people who have good insight, especially in the field of bitcoin and crypto. and has good discussion skills and I'm sure that person is certainly not easy to have a position like that, because of course before having a high position there must be obstacles and hurdles that must be overcome. but I want to ask everyone since when the reward system is given to members who have good quality. and what are the benefits of the reward?All forums that are based on SMF have rank levels and based on how the admin qualifies each member to rank it could be based on their activity or based on their posts or both, but here in this forum Theymos has set three conditions for members to rank, activity, number of posts and the most important merits.Our knowledge should not be based on our rank here, I have seen newbies with good knowledge of many subjects and some high-rank members that are noobs on some important subjects. The rewards are for you to rank and it's only important if you are going to participate in signature and bounty campaigns because they are rank based.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: I think due to perseverance. Not all have perfect insight about everything here and has flaws too. But if you did it correctly and responsibly youll achieve ranking up which isnt hard for people who do their deeds with heart. Me too, Im not so keen about such topics and just bringing up some useful and helpful to others and eventually Id rank up I really thought I was gonna stuck being a member rank but able to surpass and reach the highest ran so everyone can do it too.

And secondly, I wish to tell you that having a higher rank just like mine "Sr. Member" is very possible if you want to, but only that it comes with a lot of hard work and sacrifices of which one needs to do to make it a reality. So in regards to the answer to your question, the reward system was implemented to differentiate between quality posters and spammers, who only come to the forum not providing any value

comments.author: ThemePen
comments.body: Merits which you are saying as reward. This reward system was introduced in 2018. And you asked which kind of posts get merits. So dear if you are making informative and constructive posts and if the others will like your posts so they will give you a merit. And when you get 2 merits you will receive a sMerit(sendable merit) and this sMerit can be given to anyone. Thanks

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: OP, you just need to stay on the forum. If you are interested in bitcoin, and you can understand that this is why you came to the forum, then start studying it deeper. Even despite your age, which in the next topic confuses you so much, by discussing issues of interest to you, you will certainly receive several merits if your questions are urgent and will not carry the goal of obtaining these merits. Having risen in the rank, you will receive the privileges of participating in subscription companies, which can also be material support for you in some sense, but you should always understand that everything takes time, and as an adult man, I think you understand this very well.Stay with us.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on January 06, 2023, 04:25:15 PMI think due to perseverance. Not all have perfect insight about everything here and has flaws too. But if you did it correctly and responsibly youll achieve ranking up which isnt hard for people who do their deeds with heart. Me too, Im not so keen about such topics and just bringing up some useful and helpful to others and eventually Id rank up I really thought I was gonna stuck being a member rank but able to surpass and reach the highest ran so everyone can do it too. Exactly. Despite everything, need to move forward, even if in small steps, but one day it will lead to high ranks. Perseverance and activity will become fellow travelers in this difficult matter. I also didn't think before that I could reach hero rank and it seemed very difficult, but time goes by, and I continue to put in some effort and this is already getting me closer to a new promotion.Personally, I see the advantage of the reward system in that it allows us to appreciate our achievements more, because the harder it is to get something, the higher the value for us. You should not see the reward system as an obstacle to yourself, but rather see it as an opportunity to improve your skills through rewards of merit.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Merit is a reward that has no value elsewhere other than here, members feel good to see that their post got merited by other members, the feeling is like getting applauded for offering value to members. The benefit is the drive to make more quality posts. For every member that wants to rank up there is a desire to gain more merits and they must thrive to offer posts worthy of merits. How would you feel after offering quality posts in the forum without any merit, it can withdraw your efforts. So, the members with smerits always do their best to give out merits to posts worthy of it. A way to keep the forum moving and promoting quality posts, meaning that for every good post you make, OP, they may be merits for it now or later.

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: I wouldn’t exactly call the merit system a reward system. I’d like to think of a merit of a sign or an acknowledgment of some sort that someone finds what you wrote as useful, knowledgeable or important. And as long as someone continues to write more useful, knowledgeable or important posts, the person is bound to get acknowledgments from other members or in this case, merits. OP, With more time spent going through and reading various threads on the forum, you’re bound to get knowledgeable on the basic questions you might have. You could also ask questions for anything you aren’t so sure of.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: There is one thing that needs further clarification, in my opinion.Before the implementation of the merit system on this forum, members progressed on the forum solely on the basis of their activity, i.e. writing posts.Of course, this does not mean that each of the senior members with legendary rank is necessarily a crypto expert, but only that he has been on this forum long enough to have earned a higher forum rank based on his forum activity.I have personally seen new members on this forum who were greater crypto experts than the older, legendary members. I am especially thinking of some crypto company owners (that I know) who have no interest and time to be active on this forum, but have great knowledge and experience.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Merit will serve as a measure to how you have been contributing to the forum's growth which will turn a reward to you whenever you were given any because you will need it for ranking up except if you don't mind, it's what you do on the forum that determines how you earn it or not, merits are given by individuals or merits source at their own will and not yours, you dont ask or beg for it, but what you do determines either you earn it or not.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Solokan on January 06, 2023, 01:51:24 PMwhat are the benefits of the reward?Well, we can say that the benefit of the reward is "ranking" up, simply put. Before the introduction of the merit rule (reward, in your word) in 2018, ranking up was almost an effortless engagement. It was basically just write whatever you felt like writing and then wait for activity count to go up to expected rank. That was it. Once ranked up, one is able to get better renumeration both in signature and bounty campaigns based on one's rank. Members in the same signature campaign do similar task of meeting up certain post count but most payments aren't ever the same because of difference in ranks. May be that's about the major benefit with difference in ranks. Nonetheless, there are campaigns that have the same pay rate for all like what Chipmixer does.
